attributes.action: Value Our Youth: Equal Pay for Young Workers in the UK
attributes.additional_details: We believe that a fair wage, regardless of age, is essential for fostering a motivated and productive workforce, and for ensuring that all workers can afford a decent standard of living.
attributes.background: We urge the government to reconsider the age-based minimum wage structure. While the intention may be to encourage youth employment, the current system risks undervaluing young workers and discouraging their participation in the workforce.
